name: A-Salt! on: Cabbage Keep
description:
Farmer Cletus has had ENOUGH of those gosh darn Snails!!! He's hates them so much so, that he has lined the fields of his crops with miles of salt! 

Control the Snail through 8 levels of farmyard fun and certain death, avoiding deadly salt, deadly rakes, deadly pitchforks annnnd deadly sprinklers! That's a whole lotta deadly!

Made for the University of Plymouth Games Arts & Design Game Jam 2: Electric Boogaloo by Team Thumbaloo Drumbaloo!

Controls:

WASD - Move

ESC - Menu
